import React, { Component } from 'react' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import ABCLogo from '../Images/ABCLogo.png' class Navigation extends Component { constructor(){ super() /** State variables: * - menu controls the navbar when the screen size is below bootstrap-sm attribute. */ this.state = { menu: false } this.toggleMenu = this.toggleMenu.bind(this) } /** * Handles the Bootstrap navbars hide and show effects for the collapse navabr (When the screen ). * @param {Javascript Event} event the event associated witht the listener * @return none */ toggleMenu(event){ const name = event.currentTarget.name this.setState({ [name]: !this.state[name] }) } render() { const show = (this.state.menu) ? "show" : "" return (
  • Home
  • Inventory
  • Employees
  • Account Settings
  • Logout
) } } export default Navigation
